description: This vegan spinach and lentil pizza is smothered in red pepper lentil Bolognese sauce blended with fresh spinach, and topped with vegan cashew Parmesan.
name: Spinach & Lentil Pizza with Cashew Parmesan
recipeIngredient: 1 vegan pizza crust (store bought or homemade)
1 tbsp. olive oil (unless your crust is pre-baked)

recipeInstructions.text: If starting with dough crust, brush with 1 tablespoon of olive oil and bake per recipe instructions. If using a pre-baked shell, use as-is or heat in a 400Â° oven for a few minutes.
